text: 2.2 Sng 68.17 Bɨlel God takaw agɨnɨg, takaw ne ak dɨl ensel okok kɨlop ñak. Ñek, ensel okok agñelɨgɨpal ak nɨm, binɨb okok kɨlop yomak, takaw anɨb ak takaw nɨŋɨd yɨbɨl yek.2.2 Takaw ensel agñelɨgɨpal anɨb ak, takaw Mosis ñu kɨl tɨkak ak. Kisim Bek sapta 19-20 nɨgɨnɨmɨn. Buk Kisim Bek adaŋ mɨdeb ak, ensel kɨli takaw anɨb ak agñelɨgɨpal ak ma agak ak pen, Juda bɨ kɨli anɨgɨl nɨgɨlak, God takaw ne ensel kɨlop agñek, kɨli Mosis nop agɨlak. Aposel 7.38 ayɨp, 7.53 ayɨp, Galesiya 3.19 ayɨp nɨgɨnɨmɨn. Pen binɨb takaw anɨb ak tɨbɨlɨkɨl kɨdek ma gɨlak okok, tap tɨmel gɨlak anɨb okok nep, God kɨlop pen gɨ tɨmel gak.
